-e ---

Letter 𒄀 GIᵒⁿ like

𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 |cane, reed] | κάννα from

𒄀 GIᵒⁿ in cane

𒄀 𒈾 gi.na QANÛ cane cannabis (wegen phyth fish נפש)

𒄀𒆸 cannabis 𓊪 𒇥 bu4 botany phyto 𒌑𒀀𒇥𒋙 “plant”

𐀒𐀜 ko-no cane, σκοίνος schinus 𓇑 Seggen, rush (plant)

𒋡 𒉡 qa-nu cane, reed, an insect (moth?)

𒃶 qan “cane” in 𒃶𒊭𒆷𒇻 qan ša-la-lu a reed 𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𓇗 𓇖

𒃶𒁾𒉿 qan ṭup-pi cane-tip “pen” 钢笔 gāngbǐ
𒄀 𒁾𒉿 Griffel@tablet : graphical stylus

→ Aramaic: קַנְיָא / ܩܢܝܐ (qanyā)
→ Arabic: قَنَاة (qanāh)

→ Ethiopian:
Ge'ez: ኵናት (kʷənat), ኲናት (kʷinat)
Tigre: ኮናት (konat)
Tigrinya: ኵናት (kʷənat)

→ Ancient Greek: κάννα (kánna), κᾰ́ννη (kánnē)
Greek: κάννη (kánni)
→ Latin: canna (see there for further descendants)
⇒ Latin: *cannālis, canālis (see there for further descendants)

→ Mycenaean Greek: 𐀒𐀜𐀛𐀠 (ko-no-ni-pi /konōni-pʰi/)
→ Hebrew: קָנֶה qānḗ, “stem, reed, cane”
→ Ugaritic: 𐎖𐎐 qn, “cane; arrow”

𒊑 RI ⇔ 𒄀 GI 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 cane ⇔ reed

𓈎 𓈖 | mat | κάνης kánēs √cane <> קָנֶה kaneh: 𓂝 𓈖 𓃀 𓆰 | reed-stalk (for matting) | קָנֶה kaneh <> 𓎛𓆑𓂋 ḥfr
